donations.title: Armed Forces of Ukraine (IBAN)
donations.description: The National Bank of Ukraine has decided to open a special fundraising account to support the Armed Forces of Ukraine. This account accepts multiple currencies. It has been established and opened to receive transfers from international partners and donors in multiple currencies.

en.title: Armed Forces of Ukraine (IBAN)
en.description: The National Bank of Ukraine has decided to open a special fundraising account to support the Armed Forces of Ukraine. This account accepts multiple currencies. It has been established and opened to receive transfers from international partners and donors in multiple currencies.

ua.title: Національний Банк України
ua.description: Національний Банк України вирішив відкрити спеціальний рахунок аби підтримати Збройні Сили України. Він був створений аби отримувати перекази від іноземних партнерів та донорів у багатьох країнах.

donations.title: Come Back Alive Foundation
donations.description: One of the largest charity foundations in Ukraine. We help veterans, in particular we coorganize Invictus Games in Ukraine. The money raised here will fund the operations of our media and veteran divisions.

en.title: Come Back Alive Foundation
en.description: One of the largest charity foundations in Ukraine. We help veterans, in particular we coorganize Invictus Games in Ukraine. The money raised here will fund the operations of our media and veteran divisions.

donations.title: The Ukraine Humanitarian Fund
donations.description: The Ukrainian Humanitarian Fund is one of the UN's country-based pooled funds. Contributions are collected into a single, unearmarked fund and managed locally under UN leadership. As crises evolve, funds are made directly and immediately available to a wide range of partner organizations at the front lines of response. This way, funding reaches the people most in need when they need it.

en.title: The Ukraine Humanitarian Fund
en.description: The Ukrainian Humanitarian Fund is one of the UN's country-based pooled funds. Contributions are collected into a single, unearmarked fund and managed locally under UN leadership. As crises evolve, funds are made directly and immediately available to a wide range of partner organizations at the front lines of response. This way, funding reaches the people most in need when they need it.

donations.title: Ukrainian Women's Guard
donations.description: Ukrainian voluntary women's organization, emerged in 2014 with the beginning of the Russo-Ukrainian war and began its activity with mass premedical training for women, it is combination of psychological and psychiatric training. Since 2014 more than 30,000 women across Ukraine passed our training.

en.title: Ukrainian Women's Guard
en.description: Ukrainian voluntary women's organization, emerged in 2014 with the beginning of the Russo-Ukrainian war and began its activity with mass premedical training for women, it is combination of psychological and psychiatric training. Since 2014 more than 30,000 women across Ukraine passed our training.

donations.title: Army SOS
donations.description: Army SOS Citizen's Initiative coordinates people's efforts to help soldiers of Ukraine. Manages purchases of necessary ammunition, shields, intercommunication and reconnaissance facilities, uniforms and food supply. Delivers all goods directly to the unit's emplacement and pass them right to the hands of our warriors.

en.title: Army SOS
en.description: Army SOS Citizen's Initiative coordinates people's efforts to help soldiers of Ukraine. Manages purchases of necessary ammunition, shields, intercommunication and reconnaissance facilities, uniforms and food supply. Delivers all goods directly to the unit's emplacement and pass them right to the hands of our warriors.

donations.title: Ukrainian Red Cross Society
donations.description: Anyone who got into trouble - loneliness, sickness, poverty, unemployment, loss of family links, emergency or armed conflict - may refer to the Red Cross.

en.title: Ukrainian Red Cross Society
en.description: Anyone who got into trouble - loneliness, sickness, poverty, unemployment, loss of family links, emergency or armed conflict - may refer to the Red Cross.

donations.title: Voices of Children
donations.description: Charitable foundation Voices of Children helps children affected by the war in eastern Ukraine. We provide psychological and psychosocial support to help Ukrainian children overcome the consequences of armed conflict.

en.title: Voices of Children
en.description: Charitable foundation Voices of Children helps children affected by the war in eastern Ukraine. We provide psychological and psychosocial support to help Ukrainian children overcome the consequences of armed conflict.

donations.title: United Help Ukraine
donations.description: United Help Ukraine is working to provide life-saving individual first aid kits (IFAKs containing blood-stopping bandages and tourniquets) and other emergency medical supplies to the front lines. In addition, UHU is also cooperating with other emergency response organizations to prepare humanitarian aid for civilians that might be directly affected if Russian forces attack.

en.title: United Help Ukraine
en.description: United Help Ukraine is working to provide life-saving individual first aid kits (IFAKs containing blood-stopping bandages and tourniquets) and other emergency medical supplies to the front lines. In addition, UHU is also cooperating with other emergency response organizations to prepare humanitarian aid for civilians that might be directly affected if Russian forces attack.

donations.title: Razom
donations.description: Razom initiates short and long-term projects or collaborates on existing projects with partner organizations, which help Ukraine stay on the path of fostering democracy and prosperity. We've grown a diverse community of volunteers and collaborators across the US and Ukraine which allows us to create spaces where people can meet, partner, and execute these projects.

en.title: Razom
en.description: Razom initiates short and long-term projects or collaborates on existing projects with partner organizations, which help Ukraine stay on the path of fostering democracy and prosperity. We've grown a diverse community of volunteers and collaborators across the US and Ukraine which allows us to create spaces where people can meet, partner, and execute these projects.

donations.title: Revived Soldiers Ukraine
donations.description: Revived Soldiers Ukraine is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing aid to the people of Ukraine in support of their fundamental human rights and medical rehabilitation of Ukrainian soldiers.

en.title: Revived Soldiers Ukraine
en.description: Revived Soldiers Ukraine is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing aid to the people of Ukraine in support of their fundamental human rights and medical rehabilitation of Ukrainian soldiers.

donations.title: Vostok SOS
donations.description: Vostok SOS is a non-governmental organization helping to find shelter for internally displaced persons, assisting in the evacuation of people from the conflict zone, collecting and distributing humanitarian aid to IDPs in Kyiv as well as delivering humanitarian aid to front-line settlements, and providing psychological first aid.

en.title: Vostok SOS
en.description: Vostok SOS is a non-governmental organization helping to find shelter for internally displaced persons, assisting in the evacuation of people from the conflict zone, collecting and distributing humanitarian aid to IDPs in Kyiv as well as delivering humanitarian aid to front-line settlements, and providing psychological first aid.

donations.title: Molfar
donations.description: Molfar(sorcerer-healer) is a project of the Ukrainian nongovernmental organization People's Victory. The project's aim is effective logistics system for the medical rescue of the wounded.

en.title: Molfar
en.description: Molfar(sorcerer-healer) is a project of the Ukrainian nongovernmental organization People's Victory. The project's aim is effective logistics system for the medical rescue of the wounded.

donations.title: People's Project
donations.description: Ukraine's military and civil crowdfunding with multiple initiatives. People's Project is a non-commercial and nonprofit organization. It is an association made up of volunteers and caring people who coordinate their efforts for social initiatives aimed to support the People of Ukraine.

en.title: People's Project
en.description: Ukraine's military and civil crowdfunding with multiple initiatives. People's Project is a non-commercial and nonprofit organization. It is an association made up of volunteers and caring people who coordinate their efforts for social initiatives aimed to support the People of Ukraine.
